careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: Marine Biologist will help you build your Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Marine Biologist you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Marine Biologist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Marine Biologist now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Electrician
careers.whyThis: Electrician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Electrician you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Electrician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Electrician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Robotics Technician
careers.whyThis: Robotics Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Robotics Technician you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Robotics Technician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Robotics Technician now and understand what to work towards.
